intro: The fusion system in Plants vs Brainrots allows you to create exclusive brainrots that cannot be found anywhere else on the map. These special brainrots are obtained by combining specific plants with specific brainrots in the Fuse Machine, giving you access to unique characters for your collection.
fusionNote: ðŸŒ± Also see: Plants Guide | Brainrots Guide

sections.title: How to Unlock the Fuse Machine
intro: The Fuse Machine is located to the right of the brainrot spawn area. To unlock it, you must complete your first Rebirth, which requires:
notes: Complete Guide: See Rebirth for detailed rebirth requirements and strategies.

sections.title: How to Use the Fuse Machine
intro: Using the Fuse Machine is straightforward:
Fusion Time: Takes 3-5 minutes to complete, depending on the rarity of the resulting fused brainrot.

items: Place a plant in the machine
Add the required brainrot to the machine
Activate fusion by pressing E or tapping the Fuse button
No Returns: Once you place plants and brainrots in the Fuse Machine, you cannot get them back
Inventory Space: Ensure you have inventory space available before claiming your fused brainrot
No Mutation Transfer: Mutations from your original plants and brainrots will not transfer to the fused result
Random Size: The size of your fused brainrot is completely random, regardless of input sizes
